title: RuntimeUpdatesProcessor deletes local .env file in devmode in Quarkus 2.9.1.Final
body:
### Describe the bug

When starting Quarkus 2.9.1.Final in devmode in a Maven multi-module setup, the devmode restarts itself on the first request and deletes the local .env file in a module.

I pinpointed the source of the error to the following line of code: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/2205bb989655970f4da72b752ff2c2be7c5103cc/core/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/deployment/dev/RuntimeUpdatesProcessor.java#L983

The code was introduced in https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/25376 for Quarkus 2.9.1.Final. I cannot reproduce the bug in Quarkus 2.9.0.Final.

### Expected behavior

All "local" .env files inside subfolders should be kept AND processed.
Also, as a failsafe, only files in the "target"-folder should ever be deleted!

### Actual behavior

Some .env files are deleted without a chance to bring them back since most of the time, they are not under version control.

### How to Reproduce?

I attached a small reproducer project:
[test-quarkus-devmode-env-file.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/8719222/test-quarkus-devmode-env-file.zip)

The project has two modules: One "a-runnable-module" which simply aggregates other modules and one "common-util" module. The runnable module has a local .env file.

To reproduce, do the following:

1. Start the devmode for the runnable module: `mvn clean package -am -pl a-runnable-module -P devmode`
2. Call any endpoint, e.g. "http://localhost:8080/q/health"
3. Watch Quarkus delete the .env file in the "a-runnable-module"-folder and then restart itself.
4. You can also debug Quarkus and watch line https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/2205bb989655970f4da72b752ff2c2be7c5103cc/core/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/deployment/dev/RuntimeUpdatesProcessor.java#L983


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Windows 10

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.3" 2022-04-19 LTS

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.9.1.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.5 (3599d3414f046de2324203b78ddcf9b5e4388aa0)

_No response_
